text:

chainsaw.  I think it's simply the number of lines it contains causing the 
problem.

]]></log4j:throwable>
</log4j:event>

text:
Fixed in the latest CVS head, but I have NOT updated the Webstart build. 

Stephen (& Scott), I would really appreciate if you could test the CVS head, and 
confirm it does not break anything, and get back to me as to whether this change 
appears suitable for a new Webstart release.
